name: pnp-devproxy-minimal-dotnet-aspnet-mvc
title: Minimal ASP.NET MVC app using Dev Proxy
shortDescription: Demonstrates the minimal setup to use Dev Proxy with an ASP.NET MVC application
longDescription: This sample demonstrates the minimal setup to use Dev Proxy with an ASP.NET MVC application. It shows how to configure Dev Proxy to intercept API requests and mock responses using the MockResponsePlugin. The sample makes a single API call to JSONPlaceholder from a controller and displays the mocked response in a Razor view, demonstrating how Dev Proxy intercepts and replaces the real API call. Perfect for getting started with Dev Proxy in ASP.NET MVC projects.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy mocking an ASP.NET MVC app API request

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use Dev Proxy with .NET applications
references.description: Learn how to configure Dev Proxy to work with .NET applications.

references.name: MockResponsePlugin documentation
references.description: The documentation of the MockResponsePlugin for the Dev Proxy.
